name: Talk Audience
_source: s;Man1;These damned sophists need to be barred from Pelopos.{w}{br}They're a danger to everyone.
s;VillagerTeen;Aye! They preach law-breaking and violence.{w}{br}They're likely here to destroy Pelopos from the inside.
s;Man3;At the next assembly, we should motion for stricter controls of Pelopos's borders.{w}{br}These sophists are not welcome within our walls.
